lines: Gaban barasaat ke din haiain saavan ka maheena
aakaash mein sunaharee ghataen chhaee huee hain
rahrahakar rimajhim varsha hone lagatee hai
abhee teesara pahar hai par aisa maaloom hon raha hai shaam ho gayee
aamon ke baag mein jhoola pada hua hai
ladakiyaan bhee jhool raheen hain aur unakee maataen bhee
dochaar jhool raheen hain do chaar jhula rahee hain
koee kajalee gaane lagatee hai koee baarahamaasa
is rtu mein mahilaon kee baalsmrtiyaan bhee jaag uthatee hain
ye phuhaaren maano chintaon ko hraday se dho daalatee hain
maano murajhae hue man ko bhee hara kar detee hain
sabake dil umangon se bhare hue hain
ghaanee saadiyon ne prakrti kee hariyaalee se naata joda hai
isee samay ek bisaatee aakar jhoole ke paas khada ho gaya
use dekhate hee jhoola band ho gaya
chhoteebadee sabon ne aakar use gher liya
bisaatee ne apana sandook khola aur chamakateedamakatee cheejen nikaalakar dikhaane laga
kachche motiyon ke gahane the kachche lais aur gote rangeen moje khoobasoorat gudiyaan aur gudiyon ke gahane bachchon ke lattoo aur jhunajhune
kisee ne koee cheej lee kisee ne koee cheej
ek badeebadee aankhon vaalee baalika ne vah cheej pasand kee jo un chamakatee huee cheejon mein sabase sundar thee
vah girojee rang ka ek chandrahaar tha
maan se bolee amma main yah haar loongee
maan ne bisaatee se poochha baaba yah haar kitane ka hai bisaatee ne haar ko roomaal se ponchhate hue kaha khareed to bees aane kee hai maalakin jo chaahen de den
maata ne kahayah to bada mahanga hai
chaar din mein isakee chamakdamak jaatee rahegee
bisaatee ne maarmik bhaav se sir hilaakar kaha bahoojee chaar din mein to bitiyaan ko asalee chandrahaar mil jaega
maata ke hraday par in sahradayata se bhare hue shabdon ne chot kee
haar le liya gaya
baalika ke aanand kee seema na thee
shaayad heeron ke haar se bhee use itana aanand na hota
use pahanakar vah saare gaanv mein naachatee giree
usake paas jo baalsampatti thee usamen sabase moolyavaan sabase priy yahee billaur ka haar tha
ladakee ka naam jaalapa tha maata ka maanakee
mahaashay deenadayaal prayaag ke chhotese gaanv mein rahate the
vah kisaan na the par khetee karate the
vah jameendaar na the par jameendaaree karate the
thaanedaar na the par thaanedaaree karate the
vah the jameendaar ke mukhtaar
gaanv par unheen kee dhaak thee
unake paas chaar chaparaasee the ek ghoda kaee gaenbhainsen
vetan kul paanch roopaye paate the jo unake tambaakoo ke kharch ko bhee kaaphee na hota tha
unakee aay ke aur kaun se maarg the yah kaun jaanata hai
jaalapa unheen kee ladakee thee
pahale usake teen bhaee aur the par is samay vah akelee thee
usase koee poochhata tere bhaee kya hue to vah badee saralata se kahatee badee door khelane gae hain
kahate hain mukhtaar saahab ne ek gareeb aadamee ko itana pitavaaya tha ki vah mar gaya tha
usake teen varsh ke andar teenon ladake jaate rahe
tab se bechaare bahut sambhalakar chalate the
phoonkphoonkakar paanv rakhate doodh ke jale the chhaachh bhee phoonkphoonkakar peete the
maata aur pita ke jeevan mein aur kya avalamb deenadayaal jab kabhee prayaag jaate to jaalapa ke lie koee na koee aabhooshan jaroor laate
unakee vyaavahaarik buddhi mein yah vichaar hee na aata tha ki jaalapa kisee aur cheej se adhik prasann ho sakatee hai
gudiyaan aur khilaune vah vyarth samajhate the isalie jaalapa aabhooshanon se hee khelatee thee
yahee usake khilaune the
vah billaur ka haar jo usane bisaatee se liya tha ab usaka sabase pyaara khilauna tha
asalee haar kee abhilaasha abhee usake man mein uday hee nahin huee thee
gaanv mein koee utsav hota ya koee tyohaar padata to vah usee haar ko pahanatee
koee doosara gahana usakee aankhon mein janchata hee na tha
ek din deenadayaal laute to maanakee ke lie ek chandrahaar lae
maanakee ko yah saake bahut dinon se thee
yah haar paakar vah mugdh ho gaee
jaalapa ko ab apana haar achchha na lagata pita se bolee baaboojee mujhe bhee aisa hee haar la deejie
deenadayaal ne muskaraakar kaha la doonga betee
kab la deejiega
bahut jaldee
baap ke shabdon se jaalapa ka man na bhara
usane maata se jaakar kaha ammaajee mujhe bhee apanasa haar banava do
maan vah to bahut roopayon mein banega betee
jaalapa tumane apane lie banavaaya hai mere lie kyon nahin banavaateen
maan ne muskaraakar kaha tere lie teree sasuraal se aaega
yah haar chhah sau mein bana tha
itane roopaye jama kar lena deenadayaal ke lie aasaan na tha
barason mein kaheen yah haar banane kee naubat aaee jeevan mein phir kabhee itane roopaye aayenge isamen unhen sandeh tha
jaalapa lajaakar bhaag gaee par yah shabd usake hraday mein ankit ho gae
sasuraal usake lie ab utanee bhanyakar na thee
sasuraal se chandrahaar aaega vahaan ke log use maatapita se adhik pyaar karenge tabhee to jo cheej ye log nahin banava sakate vah vahaan se aaegee
lekin sasuraal se na aae to usake saamane teen ladakiyon ke vivaah ho chuke the kisee kee sasuraal se chandrahaar na aaya tha
kaheen usakee sasuraal se bhee na aaya to usane socha to kya maataajee apana haar mujhe de dengee avashy de dengee
is tarah hansatekhelate saat varsh kat gae
aur vah din bhee aa gaya jab usakee chirasanchit abhilaasha pooree hogee
Is kahani ka alga bhaag bohot jald isi hafte aap sun paaenge
ye jaan ne ke liye is show ko aap subscribe karna na bhule
